tdd_description: Technical design for payment integration covering provider abstraction layer, secure token vault, webhook processing, and PCI-DSS compliance architecture. The design implements a pluggable provider system allowing easy addition of new payment processors.
design_decisions: Use provider adapter pattern for payment abstraction; Implement token vault with AES-256 encryption; Use Kafka for async webhook processing; Redis for caching payment sessions; Circuit breaker pattern for provider failover
security_considerations: PCI-DSS Level 1 compliance required; All card data must be tokenized; TLS 1.3 for all communications; HSM for key management
performance_requirements: Sub-100ms payment initiation; 99.99% uptime SLA; Support 1000 TPS peak load

tdd_description: Comprehensive technical design for authentication service including OAuth 2.0 authorization server, JWT lifecycle management, MFA providers integration, and RBAC policy engine. Supports federated identity with external IdPs.
design_decisions: Implement OAuth 2.0 authorization code flow with PKCE; Use RS256 for JWT signing; Redis for token blacklisting; Keycloak as identity provider; TOTP for MFA; Implement refresh token rotation
security_considerations: OWASP Top 10 compliance; Brute force protection; Rate limiting on auth endpoints; Secure session management; Password hashing with Argon2
performance_requirements: Token validation under 10ms; Support 5000 concurrent sessions; Auth flow completion under 500ms

tdd_description: Technical design for order management covering event-driven order processing, real-time inventory synchronization, intelligent order routing, and carrier API integrations. Implements CQRS for read/write separation.
design_decisions: Event sourcing for order state management; RabbitMQ for async processing; MongoDB for flexible order schema; Elasticsearch for order search; Saga pattern for distributed transactions; CQRS for query optimization
security_considerations: Data encryption at rest; Audit logging for all state changes; API authentication via JWT; Input validation on all endpoints
performance_requirements: Order creation under 200ms; Support 500 orders/minute; Event processing latency under 1 second

tdd_description: Technical design for healthcare claims processing including EDI 837/835 transaction handling, real-time eligibility verification, automated adjudication engine, and EOB generation. Implements HIPAA-compliant data handling and audit trails.
design_decisions: EDI 837P/837I parser with X12 validation; Rules engine using Drools-like DSL; Real-time eligibility via X12 270/271; Kafka for claim event streaming; Redis for eligibility caching; PDF generation for EOB documents
security_considerations: HIPAA compliance mandatory; PHI encryption at rest and in transit; Audit logging for all claim access; Role-based claim visibility; Data retention policies enforced
performance_requirements: Claim submission under 500ms; Adjudication for simple claims under 2 seconds; Support 10000 claims/hour peak

tdd_description: Technical design for provider directory with full-text search, real-time availability, credentialing workflow, and quality metrics. Uses Elasticsearch for fast provider search with geo-location and specialty filtering.
design_decisions: Elasticsearch for provider search with geo-distance queries; PostgreSQL for provider master data; Redis for availability caching; Celery for async credentialing workflows; NPI validation via NPPES API; Quality metrics aggregation pipeline
security_considerations: Provider PII protection; NPI validation before data entry; Audit trail for credentialing decisions; Rate limiting on search API
performance_requirements: Provider search under 200ms for 95th percentile; Support 1000 concurrent searches; Real-time availability within 5 second lag

tdd_description: Technical design for multi-channel notification system with template management, delivery tracking, preference center, and compliance engine. Supports email via SendGrid, SMS via Twilio, and push via Firebase.
design_decisions: Channel adapter pattern for multi-provider support; Template engine with Handlebars; RabbitMQ for delivery queue; Redis for rate limiting; PostgreSQL for delivery tracking; Preference center with opt-out management
security_considerations: CAN-SPAM compliance for email; TCPA compliance for SMS; Opt-out enforcement; PII handling in message content; Delivery audit logging
performance_requirements: Email delivery initiation under 100ms; SMS delivery under 500ms; Support 100000 messages/hour batch processing

tdd_description: Technical design for self-service analytics with dashboard builder, real-time data streaming, KPI calculation engine, and report generation. Uses ClickHouse for OLAP queries and Kafka for real-time data ingestion.
design_decisions: ClickHouse for OLAP analytics with columnar storage; Kafka Connect for data ingestion; Redis for dashboard caching; KPI calculation engine with scheduled jobs; Report generation with Puppeteer for PDF; Superset integration for advanced viz
security_considerations: Role-based data access control; Row-level security for sensitive metrics; Audit logging for data access; Data masking for PII in reports
performance_requirements: Dashboard load under 2 seconds; Real-time metrics refresh every 30 seconds; Support 500 concurrent dashboard users
